access: A character who is a member of the Hellknights has access to this option.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Order Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=1075) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 81 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Hellknight Armiger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=20)

**Prerequisites**
[Hellknight Armiger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=907)

**Access**
A character who is a member of the Hellknights has access to this option.

</column>

---

You gain the lesser order benefit for the Hellknight order to which you belong.
name: Order Training
